tool_description: Analyzes input text to detect format type, encoding, and structural characteristics to guide preprocessing decisions.

text_content.description: The raw text content to analyze

sample_size.description: Number of characters to sample for analysis (100-10000)

error_messages: Empty text content: Provide non-empty text content for analysis.
Invalid sample size: Sample size must be between 100 and 10000 characters.
usage: Provide text_content and optionally set sample_size. The tool analyzes the text structure and returns format information.

format_type.description: Detected format type (plain_text, markdown, html, json, xml)

line_endings.description: Type of line endings detected (unix, windows, mac)

has_structure.description: Whether structured elements like headers or lists are present
